reviewText: Doesn't work the product is a defect
The movie I got doesn't work on my xbox,ps4,DVD player or laptop. And it looks like a copy of a copy movie :( disappointed zero stars of I could
I have this movie on VHS and it is great. But it is not from 2015 amazon lol
Old....was not made in 2015....do not waste your time...misrepresented as new

*this was my review for my first purchase of this movie.

Product is Bootleg.
Shipment time was great, arrived ahead of schedule.
Product boxing was unprofessionally done.
The disc covering was cheap as well and wasn't even properly fitted to the disc.
The disc doesn't work in my Xbox 1.
The distributor of the movie was MAC.. manga anime cartoon company. They're a Bootleg distributor l.

Update.. 06/27/2016
DVD came on time.
Very professionally done and authentic DVD.
No problems at all.
Great. I had no problems. My item arrived right on time
